text: Thomas Grant Gustin (born January 14, 1990) is an American actor and singer. He is known for portraying the roles of Sebastian Smythe on Glee and Barry Allen/The Flash on The Flash. He was born in Norfolk, Virginia to his mother Tina Haney, a pediatric nurse. He attended the Governor's School for the Arts program in Norfolk for Musical Theatre. He has also been to Hurrah Players Incorporated and graduated from Granby High School. He would then go to the BFA Music Theatre Program at Elon University in North Carolina for two years. From September 30, 2010 to September 23, 2011, Gustin played the role of Baby John in the Broadway Revival Tour of West Side Story. ==Filmography== ===Movies=== *Kid Fitness Jungle Adventure Exercise Video - Club Fit kid (2003) (Direct-to-DVD) *A Mother's Nightmare - Chris Stewart (2012) (TV movie) *Affluenza - Todd Goodman (2014) *Krystal - Campbell Ogburn (2017) ===Television=== *A Haunting - Stacey's boyfriend (2006) *Glee - Sebastian Smythe (2011–13) *CSI: Miami - Scott Ferris/Trent Burton (2012) *The Glee Project - Himself (2012) *90210 - Campbell Price (2013) *Arrow - Barry Allen/The Flash (2013–present) *The Flash - Barry Allen/The Flash (2014–2023) ===Online=== *NASA's Kids Science News Network - Himself (2008) ==Theatre== *West Side Story - Baby John (2010–11) ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1990 births Category:Actors from Virginia Category:American child actors Category:American movie actors Category:American musical theatre actors Category:American television actors Category:Living people Category:People from Norfolk, Virginia
title: Grant Gustin
